TopicTitle: Turning of messages from deployed science

Articles.Content:
So Ive been looking around in KSP and here to find a way to turn off the messages from deployed science cause its getting out of control. I am halfway a Duna mission and I got 1047 messages saying I got 0.001 science. I am pretty ocd so it needs to go. Lmao

 

 

Anyone that can tell me how? Im probably blind and not seeing the obvious so if this is the case I apologise in advance
Not an ideal answer, but you can always send a Kerbal out to pack up the experiment.

34 minutes ago, Aegolius13 said:

Not an ideal answer, but you can always send a Kerbal out to pack up the experiment.

Even simpler.

Switch to the base station from the tracking center, right click on it, and toggle the 'enabled' status.  No more message spam.  no kerbal needed.

Unfortunately you do need a Kerbal to turn it back on =\
